author: Special Correspondent
title: ‘Govt. going all out to tackle crisis in Kurnool’
description: Intensive survey in red zones, ‘mini centres’ among the initiatives
content: The government is putting in place a series of initiatives, including conducting an intensive survey in red zones and setting up mini COVID centres in Kurnool district which has witnessed an alarming spurt in cases, said Health Minister Health Minister Alla K… [+1232 chars]
